snippet: The aftermath of Hurricane Sandy and the New York City Marathon were brought together under the Javits Convention Center’s roof, as the event’s exposition opened.
abstract: New York City Marathon expo opens its doors to runners at Javits Center, amid storm recovery.
lead_paragraph: The aftermath of Hurricane Sandy and the New York City Marathon were brought together under the Javits Convention Center’s roof, as the event’s exposition opened.

headline.seo: Amid Storm Recovery, New York City Marathon Expo Opens Doors to Runners
headline.main: Amid Storm Recovery, Marathon Expo Opens Doors to Runners
headline.print_headline: Amid Storm Recovery, Marathon Expo Opens Doors to Runners
